creator: paulmcn1950

title: crash during auto update causes permanent core dump
content:
Last night Thunderbird decided to auto-update, and during the auto-update the process was killed*. Now I can't start Thunderbird anymore. Every time it gives "Segmentation fault (code dumped)". I already tried uninstalling and reinstalling Thunderbird. I'm on Fedora 36 and the repo installs `thunderbird-102.10.0-1.fc36.x86_64`. I have no idea what version I was running before as it auto-updates nearly every time I need it (which isn't that often). Is there any way to get it working again?

* The out-of-memory daemon (oomd) incorrectly decided that memory pressure was too high and slaughtered off my session. Bug report https://github.com/systemd/systemd/issues/25853
creator: Zom-B

title: Copy to
content: Why has Copy to changed to move to.?I When I have recently used this facility I have lost track of important mssages. have lost the ability to find messages in the time line Inbox.
creator: petermnewman

title: Thunderbirdin tili ei nouda viestejä käynnistäessä, eikä lainkaan muutoinkaan.
content:
Thunderbirssä oleva spostitili (@dnainternet.net) ei nouda viestejä käynnistäessä, ei vaikka painaa Nouda viestit eikä lainkaan muutoinkaan. Viestejä voi kyllä tilitä lähettää, mutta ei siis noutaa. Vika alkoi 20.12.2024.

Vanhemmassa koneessa, jossa myös on Thunderbird, nouto ja lähettäminen kyllä toimivat normaalisti.

En tiedä mitä minun pitäisi tehdä, pitääkö asentaa jotain uudelleen vain mitä? Vastaukset spostiin hannu@raisanen.fi
creator: hannu.raisanen

title: Inbox messages
content: Добрый день! Во вкладке "Входящие" горит значок 34 входящих сообщения, хотя по факту их нет. Сегодня поступили еще письма, они отображаются. Но общая сумма входящих сообщений по-прежнему включает эти 34 фантомные сообщения. Вероятно, это какой-то баг, как их можно очистить?
creator: taburchina

title: Failure to sign-in after updating outlook password
content:
Hi,

I updated recently my outlook password and now I can't connect to outlook.office365.com using TB version 115.16.0esr (64-bit) on lubuntu version 20.04. Connection is broken after password update. I have checked server settings they are all good.

I tried to clear TB cache but that didn't help. When I try to get messages from outlook, I am getting blank signing window, on top bar of pop up window it shows Enter credentials... but nothing is visible within signing window, it's all blank

Appreciate any help.
creator: nytipnis

title: inbox 96% full URGENT HELP NEEDED PLEASE.
content: My inbox is showing as 96% full but there are only a couple of emails in it. It's acting like I have never deleted them even though I have & do. Yesterday it said 92% full. Sometimes the folders below it, sent, junk, deleted etc show as 96% full also, other times they don't. I have compacted the folders but each day it just gets more full. Please, how can I fix this issue? And please be specific, I'm not overly computer literate. Thank you. Jo
creator: danielle.dusk2dawn
